abesinhasupirisudu nishpadanaya mangin merata siyalu nipayumwala wiyadama aduwi labhaya wadiwi apadrawya da aduwena bawa jathika piwithuru nishpadana madhyasthanaye adhyaksha sena piris mahatha pawasayi.merata karmanthakaruwan athulu siyaluma wyapara sandaha supirisudu nipayum krama mangin ihala paladayithwayak labena bawath ee mahatha pawasayi.karmantha amathyanshaya ha parisara amathyanshaye purna udaw athiwa pawathwagena yana piwithuru nishpadana madhyasthanaya mangin oonama karmanthayak piwithuru nipayumak lesa labhadayi ayurin pawathwagena yamata ha apadrawya ha widuliya awama kirimata upades laba dena bawath sena piris mahatha penwa deyi.supirisudu nipayume pradhana aramuna wadi karyakshamathawayi.

mata hithenne meka owunge yodha mathiwarana salasme ek punchi prayogayak witharayi kiyala.fesbuk wage deyak ekka patalawala ee wage nawina sankalpayakata erehiwa jana mathayak athi kalata passe lokka fesbuk thahanam karand oone kiyala adahasak dammama minissunge manasa athule punchiyata hangimak enawa ape lokka hariyata api gana hithanawa kiyala.mokada wipakshaya kohethma fesbuk thahanam karanda katha karanne na kiyana eka minissunta shuwar.eeka sanatha karamin wipakshaya prakasha kala ehema deyak kaloth eekata wiruddhawa kriya marga gannawa kiyala.ee wagema jeppo kiyala thibbe unge aanduwaka intarnet nomile denawa kiyala.ithin meka honda awasthawak thawath mati mol chanda tikak lokkata kada ganda.fesbuk thiya malapothe akurak bari un hithanne lokka rata loweth thanakata geneyi kiyala.eekath balagiridose wage ada nemeyi heta thamayi kiyala unta mathak wenne na.madhyakarayo aanduwe uwamanawata fesbuk eka marayek wage pennala dunnama oya inna aachchila siyalata mathak wenne na undalage kaleth fesbuk thiya mona maladanayakwath nathiwa unath law kerili, liyun liwili, kotu panili wage hama aluguththeru wadakma wechcha bawa saha ee palahilaw hinda diwinasa gaththu unuth hitapu bawa.
